creator: Impallari Type
trademark: Libre Baskerville is a trademark of Pablo Impallari
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Libre Baskerville is a web font optimized for body text (typically 16px.) It is based on the American Type Founder's Baskerville from 1941, but it has a taller x-height, wider counters and a little less contrast, that allow it to work well for reading on-screen. Join the project at www.impallari.com/projects/overview/libre-baskerville.
